snippet: Although the Rangers’ first-round series against the Senators featured muggings, fights and head shots, Coach John Tortorella said the series against Washington “has been an even harder series to play.”
abstract: Although the Rangers’ first-round series against the Senators featured muggings, fights and head shots, Coach John Tortorella said the series against Washington “has been an even harder series to play.”

headline.main: Tortorella: Capitals Series Has Been 'Harder' Than Senators Series
